title: Assistant Teacher at a Girls Magic School - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Mature   Romance   School Life   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   All-Girls School   Angels   Arranged Marriage   Caring Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Demon Lord   Demons   Dense Protagonist   Early Romance   Elemental Magic   Elves   First-time Interc**rse   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Honest Protagonist   Kind Love Interests   Kingdoms   Naive Protagonist   Nobles   Older Love Interests   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Royalty   Spirit Users   Spirits   Student-Teacher Relationship   Summoning Magic   Sword And Magic   Teachers   Younger Love Interests
author: Toudou Gou   東導号
description: On her way back from a training trip to a neighboring country, the beautiful wizard, Francesca Dumer, was attacked by strange demons and was in mortal danger. The one who summoned a spirit of fire and saved her was Lou Brandell, an enigmatic wizard with black hair and dark eyes. Francesca convinced Lou, an aspiring adventurer, to become a temporary teacher at a Girls Magic Academy, where she serves as acting principal. While Francesca was awed by Lou's vast knowledge and overwhelming magic, she was also strongly attracted to him.>
